subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Marlies Schild won a World Cup slalom in Reiteralm, Austria, despite losing time after losing control on her second run. Schild, the defending World Cup champion, edged Nicole Hosp by six-hundredths of a second.
snippet: Marlies Schild won a World Cup slalom in Reiteralm, Austria, despite losing time after losing control on her second run. Schild, the defending World Cup champion, edged Nicole Hosp by six-hundredths of a second.
